body: Grasshope, I will check the duplication issue once I get more time to sit down and check your file.   Thank you so much for posting about the misplaced point in relation to the CBE tool.  It was a bug in the chart that only affected cases when you connect up single values to airTemperature, radTemperature and prevailTemp.  It was accidentally setting the prevailing temperature as the y-coordinate of the point and the operative temperature as the x-coordinate.  All other uses of the chart were good so that might be why I didn't notice it until you pointed it out here. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nVneZuV00OjTjmQ8jqU2bF5L*StXzdTMvPrm3L9bFRHJHYogCr29z6YmujmcMNkS7GFRsiF5tZdiuKnuJVH**GJ0wn6BJFPK/AdaptFixed.JPG) I fixed it in the attached file. Thanks, as always, for your vigilant pursuing of bugs. -Chris
